title: Clint Eastwood’s ‘Twilight Years’
subtitle: Ruminations attributed to actor Clint Eastwood address the finality of one's "twilight years" — and, of course, politics.
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: An item variously titled "Clint Eastwood's Twilight Years" and "Preparing to Say Goodbye ... a message from Clint Eastwood" records words expressed by the actor.
